tab1.h6: Since your COVID-19 vaccination, have you had a fever or felt feverish?

tabs.question: Have you had any of these symptoms today where you got the shot (injection site)?
Have you experienced any of these symptoms today?

symptoms.name: Rash
symptoms.symp: Rash, not including the immediate area around the injection site

tabs.question: Did any of the symptoms or health conditions you reported today cause you to:

symptoms.name: activities
symptoms.symp: Be unable to do your normal daily activities

symptoms.name: professional
symptoms.symp: Get care from a doctor or other healthcare professional

description.low: you notice symptoms, but they aren't a problem
description.medium: symptoms that limit your normal daily activities
description.sever: symptoms make normal daily activities difficult or impossible
